com.camerontec.util.spring.components

Interface IHasLifeCycle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeChangeNotificationSendingComponent, BaseAutoStartableComponent, BaseAutoStartableComponentPerformingRecurringTask, BaseComponent, BaseComponentWithLifeCycle, BaseExecutableComponent, BaseExecutableComponentPerformingRecurringTask, Cascader, ConnectionManager, FileSystemManager, JMXWatcher, LocalLoggerMonitor, LocalRemoteDataMatchChecker, Logger, LoggerLifecycleStateMachine, LoggerManager, LoggerReplicationStateMachine, LogsReplicationClient, LogsReplicationClientHandler, LogsReplicationServer, LogsReplicationServerHandler, TLSCapableJMXConnectorServer

    public interface IHasLifeCycle
    This interface is implemented by components wishing to expose life-cycle hooks to their container.
    Author:
    Guillaume Jacob (guillaume.jacob@orcsoftware.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InitializationState getInitializationState() 
      void initialize()
      Performs the initialization of this component.
      void shutdown()
      Dispose of any resource held by this component.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize()
         throws InitializationException,
                IllegalStateException
        Performs the initialization of this component.
        Throws:
        InitializationException - if an irrecoverable error occurs during the initialization of the component, which prevents this component from being used in the application
        IllegalStateException - if the component's initialization state is not InitializationState.NOT_INITIALIZED

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
       throws IllegalStateException
        Dispose of any resource held by this component.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the component's initialization state is not InitializationState.INITIALIZED

      • getInitializationState

        InitializationState getInitializationState()
        Returns:
        a InitializationState representing the state of this component's initialization
